last_episode_to_air.name: Barn Burning
last_episode_to_air.overview: A mentally incapacitated war hero seeks revenge against society.

name: Suspense
overview:
Suspense is an American television anthology series that ran on CBS Television from 1949 to 1954. It was adapted from the radio program of the same name which ran from 1942 to 1962. Like many early television programs, the show was broadcast live from New York City. It was sponsored by the Auto-Lite corporation, and each episode was introduced by host Rex Marshall, who promoted Auto-Lite spark plugs, car batteries, headlights, and other car parts.

Some of the early scripts were adapted from Suspense radio scripts, while others were original for television. Like the radio program, many scripts were adaptations of literary classics by well-known authors. Classic authors such as Edgar Allan Poe, Agatha Christie, and Charles Dickens all had stories adapted for the series, while contemporary authors such as Roald Dahl and Gore Vidal also contributed. Many notable actors appeared on the program, including Bela Lugosi, Boris Karloff, Franchot Tone, Robert Emhardt, Leslie Nielsen, Lloyd Bridges, and many more.

The program was a live television series, but most episodes were recorded on kinescope. However, only about 90 of the 260 episodes survive today.

episodes.name: Goodbye New York
episodes.overview: Ray Gardner is deep in debt and can't find work due to his ruthless ex-boss. Desperate and angry, he kills his boss and steals some money. His loyal wife Mary stands by him and the two make plans to flee New York. They spend a day filled with paranoia before leaving on the train without being noticed.

episodes.name: Revenge
episodes.overview: A woman tries to escape her gangster husband by running away to Cuba with her new love.

episodes.name: Suspicion
episodes.overview: Everyone's in a tizzy over the arsenic poisoner who's still at large; police think the murder might be a woman. In the Thomas household, doting old George acts surprised to find his weed poison (with arsenic) under the kitchen sink. His wife, a delicate woman with bad nerves, defends their cook, a woman they hired who came with no references. George becomes suspicious of their employee and has the hot cocoa she left for him analyzed. When the results come back positive, he races home to save his wife before it's too late.

episodes.name: Cabin 3-B
episodes.overview: Shortly after a newlywed couple board a luxury liner for their honeymoon cruise, the man vanishes along with the fortune his wife game him as a wedding present. She reports his disappearance to the captain and is told that there is no record of either herself or her husband as passengers and that what she claims to have been their cabin doesn't exist.

episodes.name: The Man Upstairs
episodes.overview: A woman complains about the man upstairs, but no one has ever seen him.

episodes.name: The Creeper
episodes.overview: A woman who works the night shift begs her husband to quit her job, because she fits the description of a maniacal killer's type of victim.

episodes.name: A Night at the Inn
episodes.overview: Three merchant sailors and their enigmatic leader hide out at a British inn. They've been followed from India after stealing the priceless ruby eye from a holy statue. The grimy sailors ambush and kill the men who've come to retrieve the gem, unaware of how badly the statue wants its eye back. It arrives at the inn and, one by one, makes the thieves pay for their offense.

episodes.name: Dead Ernest
episodes.overview: Ernest Bowers suffers an attack of catalepsy while crossing the street, lapsing into a coma that resembles death. Believing he was killed by a passing car, his body is sent to the city morgue. His coat, with a note in the pocket describing his medical condition, is taken by the owner of a secondhand clothing store and quickly sold. The couple who purchase the jacket finds the note and begins a race to save Ernest from a premature embalming.

episodes.name: Post Mortem
episodes.overview: Following the sudden death of her husband, Josie marries Doc Archer, the man named beneficiary of her husband's life insurance policy. Investigator Westcott is suspicious after learning the doctor has a history of collecting such payouts. Westcott informs Josie that she is in danger of becoming her husband's next heavily insured "accident." She doesn't believe him--until she's almost killed when Doc "accidentally" knocks a sunlamp into the tub while she's bathing.

episodes.name: The Monkey's Paw
episodes.overview: A talisman of great power can grant three wishes to its owner.

episodes.name: Murder Through the Looking Glass
episodes.overview: A man awakens on a train with no memory of recent events. To make matters worse, a newspaper reveals he is wanted for murder.

episodes.name: The Doors on the 13th Floor
episodes.overview: Elderly Agatha Leighton returns from a trip to find her apartment on the thirteenth floor has been robbed. As she attempts to call the police, someone grabs her. Sally, who lives down the hall, attempts to visit the old lady as she'd promised, but finds she's been locked in her apartment and the phone is dead. Through the door's peephole, she sees the building's desk clerk leaving Agatha's apartment. Sally realizes something bad has happened to the old lady.

episodes.name: The Yellow Scarf
episodes.overview: In 1897 London, mysterious Mr. Bronson gives boarding to an attractive young woman from the streets. Hettie's purpose is to do housework and distract attention from his odd medical work. Bronson has two demands: she must not go out alone and must stay out of his laboratory. Restlessshe strikes up a romance with Tom, a handsome young mission worker. Suddenly, the cold Bronson turns jealous.

episodes.name: Help Wanted
episodes.overview: An elderly man who's barely getting by looks for employment to continue giving his daughter the institutional help she requires. He receives an offer from a "Mr. X" that turns things around for him. That is, until he finds out that he must kill "Mr. X"'s wife's first husband who is blackmailing them

episodes.name: The Hands of Mr. Ottermole
episodes.overview: London is being plagued by a strangler who baffles police. Sgt. Ottermole investigates, but has a difficult time when an obnoxious reporter constantly gets in his way.

episodes.name: Lunch Box
episodes.overview: A man plants a bomb in his son's lunch box at work and tells him to get out in time, but a friend, thinking he has forgotten his lunch box, places it in his car.

episodes.name: Collector's Item
episodes.overview: Evans, an older man, walks into a record store, slips the young clerk, Fred, a huge bill and pleads for him to come to his hotel to discuss something important. He goes and finds Evans beaten and mumbling something about a record. Fred gets knocked out and awakens to find Evans now dead and himself set-up to take the rap for his murder. Fred races back to the store, hoping to find the record the dead man was talking about.

episodes.name: Dr. Jekyll and Mr. Hyde
episodes.overview: Dr. Henry Jekyll experiments with scientific means of revealing the hidden, dark side of man and releases a murderer from within himself.

episodes.name: The Comic Strip Murder
episodes.overview: Julia, the model for a character in her husband's comic strip, informs a police detective that her spouse is going to murder her. He bumped off her "twin" in that morning's strip and she's sure he's going do get rid of her in the same grizzly way that evening.

episodes.name: Doctor Violet
episodes.overview: A college student studying abnormal psychology thinks the owner of a wax museum dedicated to murderers can teach her a few things. Police lock down Dr. Violet's exhibit after an actual corpse is found in the museum. unfortunately, this traps the co-ed alone with the murder expert.

episodes.name: The Cask of Amontillado
episodes.overview: In World War II Italy, Count Montressor has watched with horror as his former stable boy became a powerful Nazi general. In the process, General Fortanato has murdered the Count's sister and stolen his wife. Knowing the General plans to murder him, Count Montressor lures him into the palace's catacombs to taste the rare cask of Amontillado he has procured.

episodes.name: The Murderer
episodes.overview: Detained by the side of the road where his wife Mollie was found murdered, John explains to a deputy the events leading up to that moment. Their busybody neighbor Lillybelle had made accusations about Mollie's infidelity, as had a mysterious stranger who traveled the road near their home. Realizing John was wise to her, Mollie tried to flee but Lillybelle blocked the door.

episodes.name: Black Passage
episodes.overview: An American lover of architecture is escorted to a crumbling Mexican castle by the local padre. He warns the visitor to keep his room door locked and avoid the family that lives there--especially the maniacal mother when the black wind blows. Eventually, the curious American learns the horrible truth about the family's history of blood lust.

episodes.name: The Third One
episodes.overview: A self-absorbed couple takes their daughter on a vacation, unaware that the child is urgently wanted by health officials. The little girl was afraid to tell them she'd been bitten by a dog, and the animal turns out to have been rabid. The child hears on the radio that authorities are searching for the dog bit victim, panics that she could die, and tells her parents the truth.

episodes.name: The Man in the House
episodes.overview: Emily has moved back home to care for her battle-ax old mother and it has placed her marriage in jeopardy. Arriving home from work, she finds an escapee from a mental hospital with the old bitty tied up and gagged; she was so irritating he couldn't stand her talking anymore. While he hides at their house for a few days, Emily is supposed go to work as usual, but not utter a word of his presence to anyone or it will be curtains for the old lady.

episodes.name: The Gray Helmet
episodes.overview: A dramatic story of the Black Hand's operations in New York's Little Italy during the 1890's.

episodes.name: The Seeker and the Sought
episodes.overview: An elderly man is in a desperate search for a youngster who is in peril of passing evil's point of no return.

episodes.name: The Case of Lady Sannox
episodes.overview: Lady Sannox, the toast of London society, carries on an obvious affair with Douglas Stone, an arrogant, young surgeon. Lord Sannox, a retired star of the stage, is thought to be a clueless old man unaware of the liaison. After discussing with the Lady his plan to murder her husband so they can marry, Stone is hired by a desperate man to perform a questionable operation on his wife. Lord Sannox, we learn, is not as oblivious to his wife's infidelity as he appears.

episodes.name: Morning Boat to Africa
episodes.overview: A wayward wife of a jealous husband brings trouble home.

episodes.name: The Bomber Command
episodes.overview: Former bomber pilot D.P. Bradford and his wife Zita host a reunion for D.P.'s World War II crew. In the midst of the celebration, the Bradfords's daughter Susan is kidnapped and held for ransom by a mysterious German. The bomber crew joins forces to track down and rescue the little girl.

episodes.name: Summer Storm
episodes.overview: A father and son moving out of a boarding house get into a tussle with the sleazy landlord who promptly drops dead on the floor. Since the father has a past record, the two hide in the attic while the police investigate, waiting to make their escape.

episodes.name: The Horizontal Man
episodes.overview: The murder of a Professor has undergraduate Kate investigating the case with help from a newspaper reporter.

episodes.name: The Distant Island
episodes.overview: The story of an amnesia victim and what happens when he regains his memory.

episodes.name: The Suicide Club
episodes.overview: Prince Florizel and his cohort, Gerard, masquerade under false identities and hit the city in search of adventure. One night in a bar, they encounter a young man who says he does not wish to go on. Claiming to feel the same way, the prince and his friend soon find themselves at the Suicide Club, an organization whose members want to die. Each evening using a deck of cards, the "lucky" next victim is decided, as is the member who must commit the deed and make it look like an accident. Florizel and Gerard's charade ceases to be entertaining when a club member is ...

episodes.name: The Man Who Talked in His Sleep
episodes.overview: Teenage practical joker Jerry pretends his new stepfather revealed something incriminating while talking in his sleep. Rather than laughing it off, Henry Lord gets very defensive and becomes threatening. After suffering a suspicious accident, Jerry is convinced his stepfather has something in his past he's willing to kill to keep secret.

episodes.name: The Parcel
episodes.overview: Tommy, an errand boy, hangs around a hot dog stand when he's not in transit. The stand, a front for criminal enterprises, proves dangerous when he's hired by a shady character to deliver a package at exactly 5PM that evening. With time to kill, he goes to a baseball game. Tommy doesn't realize that the package contains 20 grand from a payroll heist and that a pair of criminals know it's in his possession.

episodes.name: The Old Man's Badge
episodes.overview: Officer Malone is murdered outside a "gay 90s"-themed nightclub simply by buying a seemingly harmless gift from one of the showgirls. His son, a rookie cop, takes a vacation from the force to find the murderer himself. At the club, he uncovers the deadly secret that got his father shot -- they're selling illegal drugs.

episodes.name: The Second Class Passenger
episodes.overview: A man taking a cruise around the world finds second-class passengers are much more interesting, and by the time things become more complicated he wished that he'd missed the boat.

episodes.name: One Thousand Dollars to One for Your Money
episodes.overview: Detective Sam Cragg goes to meet a client in the "Little Serbia" section of the city and finds the man murdered. Everyone in the neighborhood lives in fear of the unseen C. W. Roberts, a mysterious loan shark who keeps the poor permanently in debt. Cragg sends a book to Roberts and watches to see who picks it up.

episodes.name: Steely, Steely Eyes
episodes.overview: The notorious criminal Ma Barker and her gang of four sons blaze a murderous path from beginnings in Missouri to their final showdown with FBI agents and their machine guns in Florida.

episodes.name: Murder at the Mardi Gras
episodes.overview: Dan Bedell, an up-and-coming actor, has come to New Orleans for Mardi Gras and he has fallen in love with Connie Williams. Gambling boss Morgan Nelson warns Dan that Connie is in league with her friend Bill Reed to blackmail Dan. When Nelson's bodyguard turns up dead in Dan's apartment, Connie enlists Reed to help her and Dan dispose of the body. But can Dan trust Connie and Bill, or are the pair up to no good as Nelson warned?

episodes.name: The Gentleman from America
episodes.overview: An American bets two London friends that he can spend the night alone in a "haunted house."

episodes.name: Death of a Dummy
episodes.overview: A young man on a scavenger hunt for a department store sales check stumbles into a murderer at midnight in the store.

episodes.name: Red Wine
episodes.overview: The FBI pursues a man to the wilds of Borneo.

episodes.name: One and One's a Lonesome
episodes.overview: A predatory blond conspires with an old flame to murder her husband, but tosses a neat double cross at the old flame.

episodes.name: Photo Finish
episodes.overview: The former medical examiner who had falsified information in a murder case years earlier returns to town. Lawyer Robert Quartermain, who was involved in the trial, kills the ex-examiner, careful to leave no clues behind. But, he hadn't planned on having his picture taken by a street photographer when he was leaving the scene of the crime. Realizing the shutterbug possesses the only evidence against him, Quartermain is frantic to find the man and retrieve that picture.

episodes.name: Listen, Listen
episodes.overview: Be silent, husband; that is the admonition of a wife to her husband when it comes to murder. She tells her hubby to keep his big mouth shut and not tip the police off about a murder.

episodes.name: Black Bronze
episodes.overview: A reporter unexpectedly becomes involved in a series of violent, brutal murders.

episodes.name: I'm No Hero
episodes.overview: Dr. Joe Parker and his family are awakened by a gun-wielding criminal demanding treatment for his brother. The man's in serious condition after a bullet pierced his lung. With a pistol pointing at their daughter, the doctor and his wife are forced to perform surgery despite his protests that the patient requires hospital treatment to survive.

episodes.name: Wisteria Cottage
episodes.overview: A disturbed young man with a murderous background latches onto an older woman and her daughters. He worms his way into their family by charming the mother, even accompanying them to their summer cottage. One daughter's attempt to break off her flirtatious affair with the volatile man, whose true colors begin to show.

episodes.name: Poison
episodes.overview: A Britain in India awakens from a nap to discover a poisonous snake on his belly. The slightest movement on his part would mean death. It was placed on him by his hysterical wife.

episodes.name: A Pocketful of Murder
episodes.overview: Cocky newspaper reporter Turk Wilson has made it clear in articles and in person that he believes druggist Max Hensig murdered his wife. When Hensig is acquitted, he puts Wilson on notice that there are many undetectable ways to kill a man. Wilson's swagger turns to panic when a fellow reporter who borrowed his coat dies from a drug-resistant strain of flu.

episodes.name: Edge of Panic
episodes.overview: Harry Martin is an insurance agent with an alcohol problem. In a drunk stupor he apparently murders a flirty blonde who was trying to buy a large annuity. He returns to his wife Alice a few minutes before the police arrive. Harry hides while his wife is taken to the police station. The police allow Alice to see the scene of the crime since she is desperate to find her husband innocent. Alice talks to the woman's doctor and later finds a note that convinces her it was a frame up. The police arrest Harry as he is trying to board a ship out of the country. Alice becomes ...

episodes.name: Dark Shadows
episodes.overview: I. B. Trane lost his sight at the hands of brutal criminal Takama while he was in Japan on military duty. Trane's sixth sense tells him the barbarian is now in New York and that has him panicked for his life. The police and the FBI tell Trane that Takama died in a prison break over a year ago, but his gut tells him otherwise.

episodes.name: Six to One
episodes.overview: A released prisoner seeks to avenge himself on five "friends" who testified falsely against him.

episodes.name: Criminals Mark
episodes.overview: The story of a wife of an ex-criminal who tries to go straight but gets involved in another hold-up through his "pals."

episodes.name: The Man Who Would Be King
Breakdown
episodes.overview: A cruel and tyrannical office boss breaks his neck in a plane crash and is taken for dead until just before his body is cremated.

episodes.name: Halloween Hold Up
episodes.overview: A gang wearing masks finds the perfect opportunity for a hold-up during Halloween.

episodes.name: Nightmare
episodes.overview: A young father gets tragedy in double doses.

episodes.name: The Brush Off
episodes.overview: Ralph Farley, a struggling actor, overhears a plot to kill Roger Sherman, a powerful Hollywood agent. Ralph attempts to prevent the murder, but is thwarted by everyone from the police to Sherman himself.

episodes.name: Hands of Mr. Ottermole
episodes.overview: London is being plagued by a strangler who baffles police. Sgt. Ottermole investigates, but has a difficult time when an obnoxious reporter constantly gets in his way.

episodes.name: The Guy From Nowhere
episodes.overview: A young football coach in a small town gets involved with big time gamblers.

episodes.name: The Mallet
episodes.overview: A bellicose huckster travels the fairs of England shilling his magic elixir. The "doctor," as he's called, is befriended by a couple in a local tavern who proceed to get him intoxicated. The husband tells Dr. Potteton that he'd love to kill his greedy brother and asks him how he could go about it without being caught. The sideshow charlatan launches into a elaborate step by step instructions on how to get away with murder.

episodes.name: Dancing Dan's Christmas
episodes.overview: In the days of prohibition, jewel thief "Dancing Dan" is taken with the gorgeous speakeasy hostess. In the holiday spirit, he makes like Santa for the woman's elderly grandmother.

episodes.name: The Tip
episodes.overview: Elaine Court recently had a heart attack and needs relaxation, but she's stressed over a strange man she claims has been lurking about. With her husband at work, she walks into the apartment one afternoon to find that stranger waiting for her. Elaine is held hostage by the armed man who says he's just waiting for her husband to get home so that he can kill him.

episodes.name: Death in a River
episodes.overview: Two drownings, strikingly similar in their details, provide a mystery to investigators.

episodes.name: Tough Cop
episodes.overview: Rookie cop Eddie Stone takes out his anger on suspects after Ruth, his fiancé, tells him she's fallen for another man. For two years he seethes, just hoping for the day the "other man" is brought into the police station. He finally comes face to face with the scoundrel who stole his girl--right after he's been dismissed from the force for brutal conduct.

episodes.name: The Fool's Heart
episodes.overview: A story depicting a cowboy's idea of the perfect crime.

episodes.name: Dead Fall
episodes.overview: The innocent involvement of a young scientist in a touch-and-go duel between government agents and an espionage ring brings a surprising and thrilling climax.

episodes.name: The Rose Garden
episodes.overview: Two elderly spinsters bury bodies in their rose garden.

episodes.name: Night Break
episodes.overview: A killer escapes authorities while being taken to Sing Sing and searches for the person who betrayed him.

episodes.name: Double Entry
episodes.overview: Bookkeeper Horace Maybee has been skimming money for years from the small finance company where he works. With auditors coming in to examine the books, he's desperate to come up with $25,000 in a hurry. He goes to a bookie, puts $500 on a dog race, and wins. As he's about to get his cash, the police stage a raid and Horace runs off with a huge sack of the criminals' cash.

episodes.name: Dr. Jekyll and Mr. Hyde
episodes.overview: What is the connection between the eminently respectable Dr. Jekyll and the ruthlessly murderous and cruel Mr. Hyde?

episodes.name: On a Country Road
episodes.overview: Running out of gas on a foggy back road in Maine, a couple become frightened by news reports of a murderous woman who's escaped from an asylum. Searching for help, the two take refuge in an abandoned shack. When an hysterical woman appears at the window wanting refuge, they're convinced she's the lunatic that's on the loose.

episodes.name: Telephone Call
episodes.overview: The Haskells are throwing a drunken New Year's Eve party in their New York apartment. Next door, Everett Kelsey has had enough of tending to the bitter supposedly invalid wife who treats him like dirt. He's just poisoned the shrew when he gets an unnerving phone call; the female on the line says that she saw what he did to his wife through the window. Kelsey doesn't realizes it's a prank call from one of the Haskell's tipsy party guests.

episodes.name: The Three of Silence
episodes.overview: Racketeer Frank Cadwallder isn't allowed to play cards at the speakeasy because of the huge debt he currently owes. He recruits a nobody off the street to play poker on his behalf, win their "sucker money," and split the take with him. The three gambles at the table have other plans for Frank; he's shot by one of them under the table.

episodes.name: Go Home Dead Man
episodes.overview: Williams is a pilot who works for Scandinavian Export, flying by night to deliver unknown shipments to somewhere in the Arctic. Feeling something's fishy, he tries to quit but is strong-armed into making another flight. His bosses are smugglers and they plot his "accidental" death. When their attempt to murder him on a train fails, they plan an explosion with the help of the woman he believes is in love with him.

episodes.name: The Juice Man
episodes.overview: A committee investigating racketeering and political corruption in Chinatown fails to get Chan Sou, a local leader to cooperate. The district attorney convinces a detective and a newspaper reporter to probe further and the two men convince the old man to testify. Before Chan Zu can meet with the investigators he's murdered and his daughter becomes the target of the criminals because they believe her father confided in her before he died.

episodes.name: The Meeting
episodes.overview: The thief who just robbed and murdered a jeweler is trying to escape the office building when the police arrive. Sneaking down the hallways, he stumbles across a meeting of the International Association of Assassins, a group of mystery writers. They mistake him for famous author Bothwell Anderson, a writer who has come to speak to the group about his newest novel.

episodes.name: No Friend Like an Old Friend
episodes.overview: Story of an ailing concert pianist.

episodes.name: Murder in the Ring
episodes.overview: Drama about a crooked fight manager who wants to go straight.

episodes.name: Too Hot to Live
episodes.overview: Jefferson meets Rachel, an enigmatic young waitress. One moment he has a drink with her and the next moment she's dead. Jefferson doesn't think that he did it, but if he didn't do it; who did?

episodes.name: De Mortuis
episodes.overview: A devoted husband is suspected by friends of having murdered his faithless, much younger wife. He hasn't; but he might do.

episodes.name: A Killing in Abilene
episodes.overview: A man is determined to avenge his brother's death.

episodes.name: The Greatest Crime
episodes.overview: Espionage in a Russian setting.

episodes.name: Blood on the Trumpet
episodes.overview: Story of a man's flight from a murder he did not commit.

episodes.name: Tent on the Beach
episodes.overview: A wealthy socialite, kidnapped for ransom by a man whose closeness to the police helps him keep one step ahead of their attempts to track him down, wins her freedom through the astute observation of a newspaper reporter.

episodes.name: Wisteria Cottage
episodes.overview: A young man with murderous intentions latches onto a woman and her daughters.

episodes.name: The Incident at Story Point
episodes.overview: The story of a prison break.

episodes.name: A Vision of Death
episodes.overview: A nightclub performer discovers that his mind-reading act is real.

episodes.name: Killers of the City
episodes.overview: The story of a teenage drug addict and the ravages of narcotics.

episodes.name: This is Your Confession (1)
episodes.overview: A drama of an American scientist's involvement with secret police behind the Iron Curtain.

episodes.name: This is Your Confession (2)
episodes.overview: A drama of an American scientist's involvement with secret police behind the Iron Curtain.

episodes.name: This Way Out
episodes.overview: girl and fiance argue about carnival - goes in, watches show about murderers - displays about their deeds. is told to wait, as she has questions - he does not return, leaving her alone with likenesses of murderers. forced to find way out.

episodes.name: Strange for a Killer
episodes.overview: The story of a hunted criminal who loses his nerve.

episodes.name: Merryman's Murder
episodes.overview: A taut mystery based on an incident in the life of entertainer Joe E. Lewis.

episodes.name: Santa Fe Flight
episodes.overview: An espionage agent on the run.

episodes.name: High Street
episodes.overview: Tale of a house painter whose homicidal designs on a rich client are complicated by an old romance.

episodes.name: The Fifth Dummy
episodes.overview: Mystery set against a chamber of horrors in a traveling circus.

episodes.name: The Train from Czechoslovakia
episodes.overview: A documentary based on the activities of the voice of Radio Free Europe and its impact on the people behind the Iron Curtain. The story is based on the passengers and crew of the train that recently passed thru from Czechoslovakia to the American zone. General Lucius D. Clay, national chairman of the Crusade for Freedom, is a special guest on the program.

episodes.name: Moonfleet (1)
episodes.overview: A tale of pirates and buried treasure.

episodes.name: Moonfleet (2)
episodes.overview: A tale of pirates and buried treasure.

episodes.name: Frisco Payoff
episodes.overview: Postal inspector Winters has infiltrated a criminal gang and their big plan is about to go down. A postal employee drops a $120,000 in bonds out a back window to Winters waiting in an alley. Needing time to switch the real bonds with phonies, he makes up a story about being robbed and knocked unconscious. The boss, Cruze is not amused and gives Winters two hours to find the bonds and bring them back, or be rubbed out.

episodes.name: Mikki
episodes.overview: With the cryptic words "Mikki Knows" from the lips of her dying father, a young socialite hunts down the murderer of her parent.

episodes.name: The Man Without a Face
episodes.overview: Mrs. Collins arrives at the train station in town after a long stay with her mother. Despite the storm that's raging, her husband being away, and, she learns, a killer on the loose, she's determined to get back to her isolated house. Once home, the phone goes dead, the lights go out, and she realizes she's not alone.

episodes.name: Pier 17
episodes.overview: The dock workers who load nitroglycerin onto freighters at Pier 17 are on edge. A recent explosion at the harbor killed four men and the FBI believes it was sabotage by an insider. Dave Delaney and his foreman, with their eyes peeled for trouble, have decided the new guy is really a G-man working on the case. The true saboteur initially goes unnoticed.

episodes.name: Routine Patrol
episodes.overview: The story of a murder in a cabin in the Yukon territory.

episodes.name: Flare Week
episodes.overview: The story of death and terror which springs from a sports scandal on a college campus.

episodes.name: The Spider
episodes.overview: Scientists Bob and Muriel Torres honeymoon in rural Florida. Despite being warned that a professor and his son had gotten lost in the nearby swamp and were never seen again, Muriel goes exploring alone. With night approaching, she stumbles upon a shack inhabited by a blind former explorer. Muriel's fear escalates when the doctor shows off the two shrunken heads he made himself; he learned the skill directly from jungle natives.

episodes.name: The Red Signal
episodes.overview: A supposedly fake medium is hired to a conduct a séance so Sir Alington, a psychiatrist, can observe a patient under stress. She warns the doctor, Clair and her husband Jack to avoid their homes because they are in danger. Her premonition turns out to be true because of insanity, murder, and secret loves.

episodes.name: Death Drum
episodes.overview: The mayor of a French town reveals the identities of underground members, he says, to save the country from destruction by the invading Nazis. Having been moved to a neutral country, he's quickly kidnapped by allies and carried to the home of an English gentlemen to be executed as a traitor.

episodes.name: Betrayal in Vienna
episodes.overview: An Austrian intelligence chief, his debasement and eventual self-destruction, are set in motion by an act of betrayal and blackmail.

episodes.name: North of Shanghai
episodes.overview: American medical missionaries Dr. Paul Morgan and his wife are told to leave China as the Communists advance on the city. When he refuses, a Communist general kills his own wife who's under the doctor's care, then charges Morgan with murder and sentences him to death. The surgeon's execution is unexpectedly postponed when he's ordered to perform an emergency operation.

episodes.name: Summer Night
episodes.overview: The story of a woman's brush with death when she undersold the emotion of fear.

episodes.name: Night Drive
episodes.overview: Mrs. Haley takes her horse to blacksmith Bob to have its shoes checked since she'll be traveling alone by buggy to meet her husband at the train station. She's delighted when Dr. Tabor, whose wife was one of two women murdered in the woods along the way, asks if his sister can ride along. As they approach the spot of the two unsolved crimes, the behavior of Mrs. Haley's passenger becomes unsettling.

episodes.name: Day of Infamy
episodes.overview: The story opens in Germany, where a young girl loses face with Herr Goebels and enlists into the espionage service of the Japanese and sets herself up in Hawaii.

episodes.name: Four Days to Kill
episodes.overview: Johnny, a professional assassin with a hair-trigger temper, is sent by his boss to Havana to do a job. His target is his former mentor, Barney Moyer, the man who taught him everything he knows about killing. That's why the intended victim knows Johnny will spend three days watching him and move in for the kill on the fourth; Barney anticipates Johnny's every move.

episodes.name: The Mystery of Edwin Drood (1)
episodes.overview: A two-part dramatization of Dickens' "The Mystery of Edwin Drood," about a man and his uncle vying for the same girl.

episodes.name: The Mystery of Edwin Drood (2)
episodes.overview: A two-part dramatization of Dickens' "The Mystery of Edwin Drood," about a man and his uncle vying for the same girl.

episodes.name: Black Panther
episodes.overview: A criminal uses a rare doll store as the front for his diamond smuggling racket. A detective stars snooping around after a man carrying a doll is shot in the subway and the murderer steals the doll's arm. The mobster gets wise to the cop, and to an inside job being pulled by people he trusts.

episodes.name: Night of Evil
episodes.overview: Frenzy, fire and death are the results of an attempt to separate an old man from his fortune.

episodes.name: Alibi Me
episodes.overview: Ex-con Georgie Lennox has been tormented his entire life by Leo Whaley who's now out and moving in on his punch-board racket. Finally pushed too far, he shoots Leo to death. Knowing he'll be the prime suspect when Leo doesn't check in with his parole officer, Georgie goes in search of an airtight alibi. Desperate, he turns to the wife he'd walked out on earlier. Despite her cooperation, Georgie is undone by a delivery boy bringing a giant sucker from Leo.

episodes.name: The Letter
episodes.overview: In 1880 France, a wealthy woman's determined her husband, becomes a success. After paying to the have him named the minister of justice, in exchange, he writes her a note guaranteeing the job. Only the notes's disappears, and she must find the letter and save the government.

episodes.name: The Mandarin Murders
episodes.overview: A drama based on the revolutionary activities that preceded the founding of the Chinese Republic.

episodes.name: Fingers of Fear
episodes.overview: A policeman searches for the killer of a young woman.

episodes.name: Hunted Down
episodes.overview: Tale about a greedy killer trapped by social ambition and the lure of an inheritance.

episodes.name: The Debt
episodes.overview: A young drifter is robbed by two other hobos after hopping off a train. Making his way to a country store, he's offered refuge from the rain by the young woman and her father who run the business. During the night the store is robbed and the old man is murdered. The drifter's first instinct is to run, but he quickly figures out who the real murderers are.

episodes.name: Murder of Necessity
episodes.overview: A murder of necessity is caused by blackmail when an eavesdropper gets involved.

episodes.name: House of Masks
episodes.overview: Anna, a delicate and unstable young woman, despises having her life controlled by her older, practical sister. The sister is ready sign the papers to have Anna committed after she hires a mysterious young poet to be the gardener and plies him with cash. Billy has a history of being involved with young women who suddenly die.

episodes.name: Phantom of the Riviera
episodes.overview: Tale is of a will-o'-the-wisp jewel thief whose area of operations is a Mediterranean resort. Six suspects are involved before the thief is captured.

episodes.name: Night of Reckoning
episodes.overview: Story of counterespionage behind Chinese Communist lines in Korea.

episodes.name: Fifty Beautiful Girls
episodes.overview: A serial killer is murdering the dance hall girls.

episodes.name: For the Love of Randi
episodes.overview: Dr. Ted Larson's engagement to head nurse Randi Sloan is getting under the skin of Dr. David Bonnell, her ex-lover and current roommate of Ted. When a box of candy arrives one morning, supposedly from Randi, David and a neighbor kid try a piece and both become extremely sick from arsenic poisoning. Accusations of attempted murder fly between the members of the love triangle as each accuses the other of poisoning the candy.

episodes.name: The Crooked Frame
episodes.overview: Kelly Davis, the unscrupulous creator of "Sally Forth" comic books, announces she's retiring the character. This move puts her resentful staff of cartoonists out of work. She offers Webb the chance to write the stories for her "new idea"--an idea she's stealing from him. Kelly is found dead the next morning, and Webb is the obvious suspect.

episodes.name: Death Cargo
episodes.overview: A freighter bound for New Orleans for a cargo delivery encounters a great risk of spoiled fruit.

episodes.name: Remember Me
episodes.overview: A former high-school basketball star, now broke and reduced to committing small-time hold-ups, kills an old man. With the police after him, he hides out in the apartment of a lonely woman who once had a crush on him in his high-school days.

episodes.name: Her Last Adventure
episodes.overview: Eva, a wealthy middle-aged woman, marries a man she barely knows and moves into his family estate, a dark, run-down mansion on the Massachusetts coast. She learns James was recently engaged to a young woman, but he dismisses it as an unimportant mistake. Investigating noises in the cellar, she finds the corpse of a young woman, half-buried in the coal pile.

episodes.name: Woman in Love
episodes.overview: A female secret agent operating in 1952 Budapest is preoccupied with her upcoming marriage. In her thoughtlessness, she loses a valuable document resulting in her life being in jeopardy.

episodes.name: The Old Lady of Bayeux
episodes.overview: Cécile Ledru, the companion of a rich widow, Joséphine Crozier, calls the police when she finds her dead body at the estate of her nephew, where they were staying. Mrs. Crozier has apparently died of a heart attack but Maigret, the investigating police inspector is not convinced...

episodes.name: Call From a Killer
episodes.overview: The tale is about a killer who tries to hide out with his wartime buddy, unaware that the buddy is now a policeman.

episodes.name: The Return of Dr. Bourdette
episodes.overview: A detective searches for a killer and traces him to a wax museum.

episodes.name: Set-Up For Death
episodes.overview: Mobster Kip Caley is released from prison after serving ten years and proclaims he's "going straight." His old criminal cronies, however, intend to involve him in a hold-up after breaking his resolve to stay honest. Boss McLean gets him a greeters job at a hotel restaurant where he falls for a woman who works there. Her intention to help Kip by warning the police about the impending robbery put Kip's life on the line.

episodes.name: The Beach of Falesa
episodes.overview: Wiltshire is the third man sent by a trading company to work on a small Polynesian island; the previous two had strangely died. Upon arriving he encounters his competitor, Case, a man determined to keep the island to himself. Months later after Wiltshire marries a native woman, the natives refuse to trade with him because Case has convinced the superstitious people that the woman is "taboo" and cursed. Wiltshire refuses to leave the island as Case wants and takes him on in the jungle.

episodes.name: The Man in the Mirror
episodes.overview: Two men look exactly alike. One is the actual criminal and the other the innocent sap who gets nailed.

episodes.name: Blue Panther
episodes.overview: Detective Ben Shaley has been hired to guard The Blue Panther, a valuable painting on loan to a gallery. During the invitation-only preview, both the painting and the necklace of a society art patron are stolen. The gallery's owner, Drexel Courtney, is willing to pay $15,000 for the painting's safe return. Shaley's attempts to negotiate with the thieves becomes an ordeal beach each is trying to double-cross the other.

episodes.name: The Man Who Had Seven Hours
episodes.overview: A Hollywood assistant director in a stop-over in Paris is attacked by criminals on the Montmarte.

episodes.name: All Hallow's Eve
episodes.overview: In 1880s London, Mr. Markheim stabs to death a pawnbroker whose wealth he has long envied. Markheim says he intends take some of the businessman's riches, marry, and become a saintly man. An otherworldly visitor who knows Markheim intimately informs him that he will never change his evil ways and therefore should kill again.

episodes.name: The Moving Target
episodes.overview: Based on the true story of a Hungarian sharpshooter at the 1952 Olympic Games, this episode focused on an athlete whose father is held as collateral so that the athlete will not try to defect to the west. At the end of the program, a public service announcement for Radio Free Europe is heard.

episodes.name: Monsieur Vidocq
episodes.overview: A series of thefts at France's national museum threatens to become an international issue. Scotland Yard sends Williams to Paris to request help from the city's renowned, retired police commissioner, Monsieur Vidocq. Vidocq sets up a meeting with a highly-placed criminal who can lead them to the guilty, while also arranging for Williams to be killed when they all meet at a dangerous, seedy bar.

episodes.name: The Whispering Killer
episodes.overview: A mobster is tripped up by a simple law he overlooks.

episodes.name: A Time of Innocence
episodes.overview: Middle-aged Henry wants to divorce his London wife, Carol, and return home to America, but she intends to keep all of their savings. After striking up a romance with his young secretary, Henry sends out announcements saying Carol has unexpectedly died on an American trip. A friend of Carol's finds this suspicious and goes to Scotland Yard, forcing Henry and his secretary to hop a boat incognito and head across the Atlantic.

episodes.name: The Girl Who Saw Tomorrow
episodes.overview: A neurotic woman becomes distressed when she sees her best friend becoming successful.

episodes.name: The Tortured Hand
episodes.overview: A 19th century nobleman is tortured with pain in his hand, the one he used to commit murder defending his family's honor.

episodes.name: The Deadly Lamb
episodes.overview: A woman becomes the object of affection between two brothers in this romantic triangle story.

episodes.name: The Invisible Killer
episodes.overview: Pilot Dan Crowley is grounded by his doctor for his intense behavior. A delusional man who's constantly trying to prove himself, he believes the doctor's daughter should be his, even though she is happily engaged to his boss. When the couple and the doctor go for a hunting trip in the woods, Dan follows and, at night, begins firing on their cabin using a rifle with an infrared scope.

episodes.name: Little Camorra
episodes.overview: Convinced that she is cursed by an old family vendetta, a woman tries to convince her American fiance of the threat.

episodes.name: Mr. Matches
episodes.overview: An arsonist-for-hire dubbed "Mr. Matches" has been been torching buildings all around the city. Bernard Frank, head of the fire bureau, knows who he's looking for because he's spotted in the crowd at each of his jobs admiring his work. To catch "Mr. Matches" in the act, the department has an ex-con hire him to take down a building they're monitoring. His capture becomes personal after Frank's son is killed in one of the arsonist's fires.

episodes.name: Vacancy for Death
episodes.overview: Clara and Sam Warren own a run-down boarding house which acts as a front for their real business: arranging for their boarders to have "accidents." One particular evening, Sam and a partner bring home a renter, knock him out cold and turn on the gas. It finally becomes clear to Clara what type of man her husband really is.

episodes.name: Career
episodes.overview: A British agent wants to give up her spying in Nazi Germany in this story of espionage.

episodes.name: Mutiny Below
episodes.overview: After saving the chief engineer's life, Danny and Snow are hired as watch officers on a rusty steamer traveling the Indian Ocean. Reading a newspaper story about a stolen diamond being smuggled into Australia, the boiler room crew becomes convinced that Danny and Snow have the jewel. They stage a mutiny, even though the old ship is about to sink.

episodes.name: A Study in Stone
episodes.overview: After carefully faking insanity, a sculptor is acquitted of his wife's murder, but he finds nature's justice cannot be circumvented.

episodes.name: The Quarry
episodes.overview: After preventing a stranger from being shot outside of his hotel, widower Don Ashley realizes why a pair of thugs have been trailing him for days--the goons had the two similar-looking men confused. The man he saved, Gorden, had the misfortune of witnessing a mob hit and they want to silence the only man who saw what they did. With the deadly duo staking out the lobby, Don hides his face and races past the pair. Again mistaking Don for their actual prey, the two give chase. This should give Gorden the chance to contact the police and tell his story.

episodes.name: They Haven't Killed Me Yet
episodes.overview: An Asian-American agent's life is in jeopardy while attempting to break a powerful protection racket in Chinatown. Based on the work of Gon Sam Mue.

episodes.name: The Kiss Off
episodes.overview: Tom Walker, an ex-convict who was wrongly convicted and just released, holds up a tax office and leaves behind an obvious clue as to his identity. He gives the bag of money to his patient girlfriend and sends her ahead to Florida saying he'll join her soon. Soon enough, he gets the expected visit from the DA and cop who wrongly convicted him. Tom intends to make fools of his former persecutors.

episodes.name: The Legend of Lizzie
episodes.overview: The story of accused axe-murderer Lizzie Borden is dramatized.

episodes.name: The Black Prophet
episodes.overview: Convinced that the sinister "Mad Monk" Rasputin will bring about the fall of Russia with his growing power over the royal family, a group of noblemen take action. Serge Soudekine invites Rasputin to his home and fills the prophet with a enough poisoned wine and cakes to kill twenty men. This succeeds only in making him tipsy. In desperation, Serge pulls out his gun and fires repeatedly. That should put an end to the madman.

episodes.name: Portrait of Constance
episodes.overview: A newlywed accompanies her detective husband on the search for a long-missing woman, whom he once was madly in love with. A reported sighting takes Burt and Sally Hastings to a resort town where a bust of Constance awaits them in their cabin. As Burt races to see the sculptor, Sally realizes her husband's still mesmerized by the young lady. The artist confesses that the model was indeed Constance, his wife, and that he jealously murdered her.

episodes.name: Death in the Cave
episodes.overview: The tale of two adventurers trapped by an earthquake in a vast underground cavern.

episodes.name: Kiss Me Again, Stranger
episodes.overview: A serial killer is on the loose in 1946 London with five victims so far. Elderly Mrs. Thompson rents a room to a secretive young Tim Matthews and is convinced he's the murderer. She calls police after discovering a knife in his room. Meanwhile, Tim has taken a young woman he's obsessed with on a picnic in the country. Having been discharged from the Royal Air Force for physical reasons, he's insanely jealous of her former boyfriend, a strapping man who had served during the war.

episodes.name: The Duel
episodes.overview: Madeleine does not care for Raoul, the officer her father intends for her to marry. Instead, she loves Lt. Andre Duport. Her father intends to send her back to Paris and put a stop to their affair. The jilted Raoul challenges Andre to an unusual duel--only one of the pistols will be loaded and each aimed just three inches from the heart. When the time comes to prove he's more than just words, Raoul proves to be a crafty coward.

episodes.name: F.O.B. Vienna
episodes.overview: Lawrence Stevens, an American engineer, accompanies a shipment of lathes to an electrical factory in Vienna. A female reporter tells him about the huge black market for industrial machinery from the West. Corrupt businessmen are only too happy to sell products to the Communists and that his lathes are heading behind the iron Curtain to Poland.

episodes.name: The Suitor
episodes.overview: A lonely widow lives on a farm where weird and baffling mysteries are occurring.

episodes.name: Death of an Editor
episodes.overview: A militant editor's death is plotted and carried out by foreign agents.

episodes.name: Come into My Parlor
episodes.overview: A man becomes involved with a teenage gang.

episodes.name: The Adventure of the Black Baronet
episodes.overview: Sherlock Holmes and Dr. Watson are called upon to solve the case of Colonel Jocelyn Dalcy, who was found stabbed to death while visiting at the home of Sir Reginald Lavington.

episodes.name: The Queen's Ring
episodes.overview: The story is based on an experience in the life of Elizabeth I.

episodes.name: The Man Who Cried Wolf
episodes.overview: An attaché working at the Russian embassy in Mexico is about to be called home for becoming too friendly with the freedom-loving locals. In exchange for asylum, he frantically tries to interest a newspaper and the Justice Department in papers showing a communist conspiracy involving some in the Mexican government. No one believes him because of the propaganda he tried to peddle them the year before.

episodes.name: See No Evil
episodes.overview: A night club singer helps a gang plan a robbery, believing their promise not to harm the night watchman, her father.

episodes.name: The Signal Man
episodes.overview: A demented railroad signalman is tortured by fears that he is responsible for a series of train wrecks.

episodes.name: The Fury of Senorita Gomez
episodes.overview: A highborn lady in the 19th century of Peru plots with her stableman to murder her uncle.

episodes.name: The Mascot
episodes.overview: An American correspondent risks his life to secretly record a candid interview with an army deserter, exposing his evil plan to become dictator of a Mediterranean Island.

episodes.name: The Dutch Schultz Story
episodes.overview: True story of the notorious gangster Dutch Schultz who became kingpin of the underworld, only to be knocked from his throne by blazing guns in a New Jersey tavern.

episodes.name: Pigeon in the Cage
episodes.overview: A drama of frustrated lovers caught in a web of crime and deceit.

episodes.name: The Dance
episodes.overview: Joan Hale first sees the Charleston performed at a society party on a visit to the South. During her stay, she and Charlie fall in love despite his engagement to the scheming Marie. Gunshots interrupt the dance and Marie is found upstairs--murdered. Though Charlie is the prime suspect, several others has ample motivation to pull the trigger.

episodes.name: Vial of Death
episodes.overview: A deadly vial of cholera is stolen from a doctor's medical bag.

episodes.name: Point Blank
episodes.overview: When a gang leader tries to burn his bridges behind him the backfires get awfully, warm.

episodes.name: Nightmare at Ground Zero
episodes.overview: The Nevada Proving Ground is set for another nuclear bomb blast at 4 AM. A harried artist is rushing to finish the mannequins he's been hired to construct that will populate a house at ground zero. His nagging wife, who does nothing but complain about his work, finally pushes him over the edge. As contracted, he delivers five "people" to the house that's about to be destroyed.

episodes.name: Death in Passing
episodes.overview: A tale of murder on Manila's waterfront and an island detective with one of the most puzzling cases of his career.

episodes.name: Paradise Junction
episodes.overview: The story of a traveling circus and its unhappy owner.

episodes.name: Reign of Terror
episodes.overview: An innocent woman is sentenced to death during the French Revolution.

episodes.name: The Darkest Night
episodes.overview: Murder and blackmail ruin a bride-to-be's bridal shower.

episodes.name: The Riddle of Mayerling
episodes.overview: A dramatic adaptation of the famous and true story of a commoner's ill-fated romance with the Archduke Rudolph of Hapsburg.

episodes.name: The Sister
episodes.overview: The tragic tale of a pair of recluses whose lives are brought into focus for the first time after years of frustration and jealousy.

episodes.name: Death at Skirerud Pond
episodes.overview: The story of a tense trial in Norway when a jury was asked to remember what it was like in their homeland during the war. The actual verdict is revealed at the end of the program.

episodes.name: The Accounting
episodes.overview: The story of a corrupt supply captain, son of an illustrious military hero, and a fiercely loyal major who challenges him to a duel to preserve the family's honor.

episodes.name: The Valley of the Kings
episodes.overview: The tense story of an archaeological expedition searching for the tomb of King Tutmose. They finally find it and its treasures untouched; but then the curse of the Pharaoh on anyone defiling his tomb's sacred precincts begin to strike.

episodes.name: The Interruption
episodes.overview: An English gentleman gloats over the murder of his wife only to learn that his evil housekeeper knows his secret.

episodes.name: Needle in a Haystack
episodes.overview: The behind-the-scenes story of how the U. S. Navy ferreted out the secret of Communist minefields in Wonsan Harbor, enabling minesweepers to clear the way for the safe landing of 22,000 Marines.

episodes.name: The Newcomer
episodes.overview: A story of a brash stranger in a small Western town who changes his ways when arrested for the murder of a local belle.

episodes.name: My Short Walk to Freedom
episodes.overview: When a fugitive from a Russian concentration camp is cornered in his Budapest home, he disguises himself and his brother to try a get beyond the Iron Curtain.

episodes.name: Laugh It Off
episodes.overview: A kindly young man believes a girl's story that she is marked for murder and risks his life to save her, despite warnings from friends that she is a habitual liar and thrill-seeker.

episodes.name: The Dance
episodes.overview: This episode is a remake of an episode previously shown on the series. This episode and the previous one were both shown live and featured different casts.

episodes.name: Cagliostro and the Chess Player
episodes.overview: A dramatization based on the life of the 18th Century Italian magician, Count Alessandro di Cagliostro. The cunning magician inveigles King Stanislaus into a chess game with his mechanical genius. That, in the end, becomes his downfall.

episodes.name: The Gift of Fear
episodes.overview: A little boy in a department store and a night watchman who likes toys better than people are featured in this odd Christmas tale.

episodes.name: Mr. Nobody
episodes.overview: A wealthy, vicious woman turns a goodhearted but naive tramp into a pawn in her evil plans.

episodes.name: Diamonds in the Sky
episodes.overview: A gang of smugglers, diamonds and a beautiful woman add up to trouble for the pilot on a trans-Atlantic flight.

episodes.name: The Scrap Iron Curtain
episodes.overview: The true story of Baclav Uhlik, a Czech machinist who built an armored car and last July transported his wife, two children and four friends 40 miles through the Bohemian forests to the town of Waldmeunchen in the western zone of Germany.

episodes.name: The Haunted
episodes.overview: The second wife of a ski-lodge owner suspects her husband of the murder of his first wife.

episodes.name: An Affair With a Ghost
episodes.overview: A dead French underground leader returns to save a band of hostages when a Nazi collaborator goes back on his promise.

episodes.name: The Man Who Wouldn't Talk
episodes.overview: A drama based on the hoax of Canadian George DuPre, who claimed service in the French underground as a British intelligence officer during World War II.

episodes.name: The Moonstone
episodes.overview: A precious stone taken from India is coveted by many parties.

episodes.name: The Execution
episodes.overview: Her son's heroic death in battle unseals the lips of a mother about a 10-year-old tragedy involving her brutal husband.

episodes.name: Death on the Screen
episodes.overview: A frantic wife sits by her TV set, watching a public dinner where a deranged man is getting ready to kill her husband.

episodes.name: I Do Solemnly Swear
episodes.overview: The story of the first woman juror in the United States, in 1870 in Laramie, Wyoming.

episodes.name: Before the Act
episodes.overview: A young bank official is the intended scapegoat of a carefully designed plan to rob the vault of $100,000.

episodes.name: The Fourth Degree
episodes.overview: A psychiatrist makes a weird experiment in a last ditch attempt to get a key witness in a homicide case to talk.

episodes.name: The Tenth Reunion
episodes.overview: A college reunion crowd discover that one of the gang has been missing since graduation. Those present have had reasons to do away with her.

episodes.name: Torment
episodes.overview: Behind the Iron Curtain, a condemned prisoner's wife tries to save him by appealing to an old friend, the police chief.

episodes.name: Operation: Barracuda
episodes.overview:
Operation:Barracuda is a 1954 TV episode or short film directed by Robert Mulligan.

"The heartless captain of a German u-boat crashes his vessel along the Atlantic coast at the close of WWII. Only the captain and his lieutenant escape the sinking vessel containing the personal fortune of Nazi leader Herman Goering. After eight years, the captain returns to salvage the loot and tries to recruit his former shipmate in the effort." - Episode Summary from TV.com

episodes.name: The Return Journey
episodes.overview: A window washer is tempted by an unguarded amount of money and realizes the error in his judgment all too soon.

episodes.name: The Terror Begins
episodes.overview: The story of how Stalin held a grip on the Russian people after assassinating S.M. Kirov.

episodes.name: Smoke
episodes.overview: The two sons of a disgusting and destructive old man stand to benefit as a result of his violent death.

episodes.name: Operation: Nightmare
episodes.overview: A dramatization of the heroics of nurse Ann Bernatitus during the Battle of Bataan.

episodes.name: Breakout
episodes.overview: A prison riot breaks out and a guard is taken hostage. The inmates want the keys to the main gate in exchange for the guard.

episodes.name: Fingerprints
episodes.overview: A true story taken from the cases of Alfonse Bertillon, chief of the Identification Bureau of the Paris Police in the early 1900's. Bertillon invented the first system of crime detection through the use of physical features.

episodes.name: Race Against Murder
episodes.overview: A young doctor leaves his practice to find a cure for polio after watching his patients suffer.

episodes.name: North Side
episodes.overview: The true story of the workings of a New York homicide squad as it goes about the solution of a brutal murder.

episodes.name: The Pistol Shot
episodes.overview: An Army Captain wants revenge on a fellow officer in 19th century Russia. The young Captain has bested him in cards and love.

episodes.name: String
episodes.overview: Thirty men in a secret unit, started by President Roosevelt during World War II, are captured and tortured at the Belsen concentration camp before escaping.

episodes.name: The Hunted
episodes.overview: An unethical hunter is caught shooting a tame animal on a wildlife preserve. The game warden delivers an unexpected punishment: three bullets and a ten minute head start.

episodes.name: The Girl in Car Thirty-Two
episodes.overview: An investigator puts his life in danger after he falls for the woman he is tailing.

episodes.name: Conversation at an Inn
episodes.overview: A bicyclist makes up fantastic tales of murder on "clues" she finds along her rides. When she finds a shoe and a lighter, she tells an elaborate tale that turns out to be very close to the truth.

episodes.name: Once a Killer
episodes.overview: A woman's faith in a hoodlum is destroyed when the police prevail upon her to get him to surrender.

episodes.name: Main Feature: Death
episodes.overview: A woman gets locked in movie theater by mistake and encounters a pair of killers who break in to rob the safe.

episodes.name: The Last Stand
episodes.overview: A would-be recluse's best friend discovers gold on his land. He realizes his only security is his friend's death, but he is thwarted in the effort of murder by some fast-traveling news.

episodes.name: The Iron Cop
episodes.overview: A policeman's niece is murdered. He resolves to find the killer but has to pit his wits against an "electronic brain" to do so.

episodes.name: Barn Burning
episodes.overview: A mentally incapacitated war hero seeks revenge against society.
